law.catch_line: Adoption of proceeding by other sureties or personal representative.
law.text: The remedy given to the surety by KRS 62.090 to 62.120 may be adopted by his personal representative. Any surety in the bond may, at any time before the final action upon the motion, unite with the movant and ask for the same relief.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4662.
